item.description:
Please join us for a casual evening of sharing, networking and collaborating.

This month we are gathering at Brutole Restaurant, 65 Newbury Street, Danvers, MA. www.brutolerestaurant.com

This is a great way to kick off the new year, jump start your networking efforts for 2010, and meet the members of the BNI Chapter, North Shore Networkers.

Additionally, we will be hosting a Visitor's Day at our weekly meeting on January 14th, 7 am, in Topsfield, MA, for all interested. Please feel free to contact Christine Bolzan, event organizer, for more information and check us out on the web at www.bnimass.com.
item.name: North Shore Networkers January MeetUp
